CustomField.formula: IF(Course_Type__c = "Theory", Theory_Secured_Marks__c+ Seminar_Secured_Marks__c+ Quiz_Secured_marks__c, IF(Course_Type__c = "Practical", Knowledge_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c+ Execution_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c+ Description_of_Experiment_Secured_Mark__c+Viva_Voce_Practical_Secured_Marks__c+Punctuality_Secured_Marks__c+ Results_Secured_Marks__c, Selection_of_Topic_Secured_Marks__c+ Analysis_and_Synthesis_Secured_Marks__c+ Literature_Survey_Secured_Marks__c+ Ethical_Attitude_Secured_Marks__c+ Independent_Learning_Secured_Marks__c+ Oral_Presentation_Secured_Marks__c+ Report_Writing_Secured_Marks__c+ Continuous_Learning_Secured_Marks__c ) )
CustomField.label: Total Secured Marks
